parameters:
\N<Ryuda Soldier>This is the training institution of Ryuda. If you have no
business here, leave before unnecessary suspicion falls upon
you.
\N<Ryuda Soldier>Can't you see? I'm studying right now, don't talk to me...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>My dad is fighting in the training troops... It's still okay
for now, but I wonder what will happen to me and mom if he
ever loses...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>What am I even doing here... To become a soldier of Ryuda?
Or maybe...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Who...? If you have no business, please go over there. I
don't want to be seen by the Ryuda soldiers.

\N<Man>Here is where the children of the town learn. It used to be
a pure place of study, but...
\N<Red Cap Boy>Hey, Riia-kun and Rame-chan... h-hello.
\N<Riia>Hello. How is it? Have you gotten a bit used to this place?

\N<Red Cap Boy>Yeah... j-just a little. Thanks a lot for saving me from
them the other day.

\N<Riia>It's nothing. My dad always says we have to help people in
trouble.
\N<Red Cap Boy>I see... Your dad must be a great man.

\N<Riia>Yeah, when I grow up, I'm definitely going to be a man like
my dad.
\N<Rame>Like Yuia-san? It seems impossible for Riia-chan though.

\N<Riia>What's that supposed to mean? That's not true, I'll
definitely become a strong man like my dad.

\N<Rame>Become strong? Lately, Riia-chan always says that, but what
for...?

\N<Riia>That's obvious, isn't it? Of course... it's to protect the
people important to me.

\N<Rame>...I see, who are you going to protect by becoming
strong...?

\N<Riia>Th-that's none of Rame-chan's business. Why are you asking
that?
\N<Rame>...It's not unrelated.
\N<Riia>Huh...?

\N<Red Cap Boy>Uh, um... you two... are always together. Does that mean...
you're good friends... or something?
\N<Riia>That's not it. Rame-chan just follows me around on her own.

\N<Rame>That's right, we're not friends or anything. It's always
Riia-chan who follows me around on his own.
\N<Riia>What are you talking about? That's not true at all.
\N<Rame>Really? That's how it looks to me.

\N<Red Cap Boy>Uh, um... can I ask something? Riia-kun, you say you want to
be like your dad... but it sounds like your dad is no longer
around?
\N<Rame>Y-Yuia-san... Riia-chan's dad is...!
\N<Riia>...It's okay, Rame-chan. Dad will definitely come back...

\N<Red Cap Boy>I see! So if he's coming back, that means he's not here now,
right?! Then... does your beautiful mom have a boyfriend or
something now...!?
\N<Rame>Wh-what are you saying...?

\N<Red Cap Boy>Oh, uh...? What's wrong, Riia-kun? Did I say something
weird...?
\N<Rame>Riia-chan...

\N<Red Cap Boy>Heh, hehe... but it's okay. Since we're alone together,
let's talk... Rame-chan.

\N<Red Cap Boy>I-I'm called Uripo. Please take care of me from now on...
hehe...
\N<Rame>...
A
